page.title: 14Festival Hall,Kirkby
page.content:
On Friday 24th May,a group of children from Kingsway Primary School went to the Festival Hall on Hodgkinson Road. The Hall cost about Â£750,000 to build. This money was provided by the district council.The building is heated by a coal-fired boiler.Here are a few of the most common activities and how much they cost for an hour's hire (unless otherwise stated): Badminton{...........Â£1.50 Table tennis{........Â£1.00 Snooker/billiards{...Â£1.50 Squash{(40 minutes)..Â£1.50
There are annual events and competitions. On average, 3 to 4 thousand people use the Hall every week. 30 people are on the staff including 9 full-time workers.
